title: I just played a rank game, and I got an A with 17-1-15,tell me why.
body: I have just finished a rank game, i played Ezreal and do over 50,000 damadge, 17-1-16, and the system just give me an A, the Vol'z is 13-5-15 and got a S, i dont know why, i need a explanation. U can search this match my game ID is EDG OperaOfDeath, in Oceania. I'm looking forward to an answer.

replies.body:
Probably because you had booty cs.

Edit: Yes, you had booty cs. 5 cs/min.

Edit#2: You only dealt the 3rd highest damage in game.

Edit#3: You placed the 3rd FEWEST wards in the game, and least amount on your team.

Edit#4: You took 1 tower, and even gave up first tower blood to your lane enemy.

Basically, you didn't get an S because you are confusing Call of Duty with League of Legends, and therefore think the game is 100% based on the number of kills you got. Yes, you played really well that game. Not debating that. But unless you have a complete game, you're typically not getting an S.

Edit#5: As for comparing to Vel, he had 100+ more cs than you, 18,000+ more damage than you, placed 6 more wards, killed 1 more ward, placed 1 more control ward, **had 1k+ more gold than you**, took 1 more tower, and took 1 more inhib than you. If you don't think all of that equals 4 kills, I don't know what to tell ya lol. His KDA was still over 5+, which is more than enough to get an S rating.
Why you murder this poor soul? At least put the lube on first...

Bottom line is he didn't do as well as the other people who have played Ezreal. It really comes down to that because that is what your score is compared to in the first place. It has not one damn thing to do with the other champs in the game. RIOT has stated this over and over and over and over yet people still think it has something to do with the other 9 people in the game.
